effect.black_white: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.black_2_white_2: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.black_white: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.black_white: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
